title: Rani Vaaram Polki Jhumkas: Timeless Elegance
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold) base with Hyderabadi Polish. Features uncut Polki diamonds of exceptional clarity
complimented by delicate pink gemstones. All stones are meticulously hand-set in a closed setting.
features: These elegant jhumkas boast a classic design with a floral motif. The upper part features a unique Polki setting, while the lower portion showcases a vibrant floral arrangement using pink gemstones set in a 'kundan' style, creating depth and sparkle. The open setting of the Polki diamonds enhances their natural brilliance.
colors: The primary colors are warm gold
clear white from the Polki diamonds
feminine pink from the gemstones. The Hyderabadi Polish lends a subtle antique golden glow.
occasions: and special occasions. Also suitable for modern events and evening wear where a touch of traditional elegance is desired.
description: These Polki Jhumkas are a testament to timeless elegance and exquisite craftsmanship. They feature genuine uncut Polki diamonds, known for their unique sparkle and historical significance. The combination of traditional design with a contemporary feel makes them a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish ensures durability and a lasting shine. A true heirloom piece.
